author: deweese
msg: Fixed a bug in the dispatch of scroll events.
It wouldn't generate a scroll event for just vertical scrolls.

author: deweese
msg: Implementing Documentation fixes suggested by Arne.

author: deweese
msg: 1) Fixed bug 34847 - incorrect rendering when given width height match

author: deweese
msg: 1) BridgeContext now has two new methods createSubBridgeContext
and createBridgeContext that are used to create the
BridgeContext for referenced documents.  It also now
'carries over' the text painter from the current BridgeContext
2) CSS Identifiers are now allowed to start with the escape character '\\'.

author: deweese
msg: 1) JSVGScrollPane now has factory methods for most listeners.
Fixes scrollbars hanging around when switching documents.
3) Java2D Arc2D with negative extends > 180 now transformed into
path commands correctly (were missing large arc flag).
